programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

Pathfinder
programme.desc: Life Beyond Fear. Pathfinder is a tale about the human spirit.The film follows six world-class slackliners (Highliners) on a mission deep into the Norwegian mountains to attempt something that’s never been seen before: Walking a thin line, elevated in the vastness between two colossal cliffs, illuminated only by the mystical northern lights.

programme.title: On the Verge
programme.desc: In the mountains behind the sleepy coastal town of Powell River, BC, a small group of rock climbers has spent decades quietly pioneering routes on some of the largest granite walls in Canada. As the last stands of old-growth trees harboured in these valleys come under threat of logging, the climbing community faces the uncertain future of a place that has come to define their lives and legacies.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking Lake Mazinaw
programme.desc: Bon Echo is a small and extremely beautiful Provincial Park in Ontario's Highlands, which draws in visitors from all over thanks to the world class canoe tripping and kayak touring that it offers. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he takes in the dramatic cliff faces on Lake Mazinaw, which bear hundreds of Indigenous pictographs, from the seat of his sea kayak.

programme.title: The Mega-Gap
programme.desc: Join Teton Gravity Research and Anthill Films as they build a 70-foot gap for Tom Van Steebergen to go as big as he has ever gone on his mountain bike while filming for unReal, TGR's 2015 bike film.

programme.title: The Himalayas
programme.desc: Join Jeremy Jones and the Teton Gravity Research team as they set out on their last and most difficult expedition: Trekking high into the Himalayan Mountains of Nepal for Higher, TGR's 2014 snowboard film.

programme.title: P3: Pedal Powder Paddle
programme.desc: Three friends from Canmore Alberta set out to paddle board the headwaters of one of Canada’s longest rivers, the north Saskatchewan. To get there they will have to bike, hike, ski and snowboard their way across two glaciers and one 11,000’ mountain ….all in one epic day.

programme.title: The Mentor
programme.desc: Professional climber Marcus Garcia travels from his home in southwest Colorado’s San Juan Mountains to the limestone cliffs and spires of El Potrero Chico in northern Mexico to revisit his mentor’s final climb. In an emotional and powerful act of closure, he reflects on the accident that took him a decade to talk about—and climbs the route that took his mentor’s life.

programme.title: Resilient
programme.desc: Life flourishes when you can learn to push down barriers and challenges that can be thrown at you out of nowhere. Jerad Fischer, Lindsey Runkel, and Dan Soller are the living proof of how you can keep shredding and attacking life with a positive and tenacious attitude after a life-changing injury. From Colorado local dirt jumps, to Highland Mountain, to the Adaptive MTB World Champs, “Resilient” will prove that we are all capable of what we put our minds to! Finalist – VIMFF 2020.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: WEMTB
programme.desc: WEMTB is a 30 minutes Mountain Bike project filmed in Spain and 2 islands, Tenerife and Ibiza, with top Spanish riders such as Toni Ferreiro, Bernat Guardia, Edgar Carballo, Gabriel Torralba, Iago Garay and many more. Including sisters, brothers, father and son, a wolf dog and Pablo Alonso pedalling against Parkinson´s disease. Nature, family, self improvement and beautiful trails. Filmed and produced by Dirtyflows in 2018 and 2019.

programme.title: Kayaking the 'Canadian Amazon'
programme.desc: Big Creek in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County is commonly referred to as ‘the Canadian Amazon’ as it winds its way through thick forest, while presenting paddlers with a natural obstacle course of fallen trees. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores this ecological wonder from the seat of his kayak.

programme.title: Paddling Opemican National Park
programme.desc: With more than 20,000 lakes and rivers and endless pristine wilderness, the Abitibi-Témiscamingue region in Southwestern Québec is a paddler's paradise.

programme.title: Dubai International Baja
programme.desc: The Dubai International Baja is an international baja rally event based in Dubai held around the facilities of the Dubai Innovation Centre.

programme.title: P1 Offshore Powerboats
programme.desc: Powerboat P1 returns to Sheboygan, WI, for the Sheboygan MidWest Challenge.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Mission King of the Baggers
programme.desc: V-twin mayhem hit Road Atlanta in Race 1 of King Of The Baggers! Kyle Wyman, Troy Herfoss, and more went bar-to-bar in a brawl of horsepower and handling.

programme.title: Peterson Automotive Museum Global Garages
programme.desc: Tim Allen shares his private garage containing a diverse car collection of hot rods, customs, sports cars, and even a Tesla! Some celebrity garages only have new cars, but Tim is a genuine hot rodder and enjoys building cars and driving fast.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul
programme.desc: Catch all the can't-miss moments from Race 1 of the Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul at Barber.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul

programme.title: Sams Garage
programme.desc: Sam helps his daughter change her Kia Optima Hybrid Battery

programme.title: Baking & Cooking
programme.desc: Learn to bake and cook with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: The New Millennium - the 2000's
programme.desc: As the new century dawned, fashion had gone from corsets to spandex pants in just 100 years. Even dogs were getting dressed up. Paulette Bell creates a customized dog coat using machine embroidery. Angela Wolf adds a hand warmer to work-out wear for today's trendy touch.

programme.title: Stylish Home
programme.desc: Your home reflects who you are. Using an easy smocking technique, sewing enthusiast Cheryl Sleboda makes colorful, patterned pillows to showcase her style. Blogger Heather Valentine combines unusual materials to create a handy caddy for her studio. With hand-dyed wool and nubby fibers, author Lisa Shepard Stewart stitches a lush wall-hanging.

programme.title: T-Shirt Finishing Tips: Hems, Necklines + Weaving in Ends
programme.desc: So you’ve finished knitting your Novel-T, now what? Tune in to see how to weave in the ends when working with cotton yarn. Hint: this method involves fabric glue.

programme.title: Patterns
programme.desc: Patterns are a design, motif or decoration, formed from regular repeated elements. They can also be naturally-occurring or a random arrangement of shapes, colors which have a regular or decorative effect. Patterns can be stripes, or lines, or alternating colors. The first project has a striped pattern of knots tied with plastic lacing. Next, make felt cookies with a polka dot pattern. Then add a chevron pattern to your art journal. Last, create a folding play mat with landscape patterns of a city scene around a lake.

programme.title: Photography
programme.desc: Learn photography with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: Bunny Cake
programme.desc: Join Rachael Teufel to create the cutest bunny cake that's perfect for any spring occasion. Learn how to sculpt a set of adorable eyes and floppy ears before shaping the nose, paws, and of course, the fluffy bunny tail. Practice some basic shaping and freehand cake painting in this fun project.

programme.title: Boo Moon - Casper The Friendly Ghost (1954)
programme.desc: Casper follows a frightened crowd out of a subway station and encounters a man selling views of the moon through a telescope. After scaring off the man, Casper flies to the moon but is captured by tiny moon men who treat him as an enemy until he helps them defend against animated trees and is ultimately embraced as a friend by King Luna and the moon men.

programme.title: The Curse of the Crying Woman (1963)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits a mansion, only to discover that it is haunted by witches and evil spirits.

programme.title: The Curse of the Crying Woman (1963)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits a mansion, only to discover that it is haunted by witches and evil spirits.

programme.title: International friend
programme.desc: In order to go north to fight against Japan, the Red First Front Army decided to cross the Yellow River east to rush towards the front line of the Anti-Japanese War. Sword of Xingguo was ordered to cross the river secretly on a sheepskin raft in advance, entered Sanjiao Town in Shanxi Province, controlled the ferry, and welcomed the Red Army to cross the river. Then, Sword of Xingguo received an order from the headquarters to go to the blockade to secretly meet American reporter Edgar Snow and doctor Ma Haide. On the way, a political bandit followed them in an attempt to kill the international friend and blame the Red Army. The sword of Xingguo fought with wits and courage to destroy the bandits plot, sending the two international friends safely to the Red Army headquarters. In order to welcome the Fourth Red Army to join forces in the north, Sword of Xingguo was ordered to go to Huining to investigate the enemys situation. On October 2, 1936, the cavalry regiment of the 15th Red Army captured Huining County and went south to guide the Fourth Red Army into Huining. On October 10, the Red First and Red Fourth Front Army joined forces in Huining, Gansu. After the victory of the First and the Fourth Front Army joined forces, the headquarters ordered Sword of Xingguo to carry a radio to look for the Second Red Front Army that was heading north. In mid-October, Sword of Xingguo found the Red Second Front Army at the foot of Liupan Mountain, which was fighting fiercely with the enemy. The Red Second Front Army quickly broke through the encirclement and moved closer to the Shaanxi-Gansu Soviet Area. At the beginning of late-October, the three main forces of the Red First, Second, and Fourth Front Army successfully joined forces in Jiangtaibao, Xiji County, Ningxia, declaring the victory of the Long March.

programme.title: They Will Soon Come Together
programme.desc: Sarah, Slowly, and Greeny are a team with a clear mission: to keep a watchful eye on both sides of the bay. Their dedication and focus are evident as they carry out their roles with precision. Together, they will soon come together to share their insights and ensure the safety and security of those in the area.

programme.title: We Can Overcome Any Obstacle
programme.desc: Although challenges may arise, we must continue to push forward with determination and bravery. Let us face our problems head on, with a resolve that will never falter. Together, we can overcome any obstacle in our path and emerge victorious. Never give up hope, for fortune favors the bold. Let us move forward with courage and strength, towards a brighter tomorrow.

programme.title: Kidnapping Grandpa
programme.desc: The situation with Grandpa Hammer and the Buster Gang can be concerning, but we must not lose hope. Let us trust that there is a reason behind their actions and that our Q-Star League can help bring a positive resolution. The recent earthquake on Statue Mountain may have caused fear and uncertainty, but we believe our community will come together to overcome this crisis. Let us focus on working together toward a brighter future.

programme.title: Buster Gang gets home safely
programme.desc: Amidst the dark and enigmatic cave, a remarkable sight unfolds before our very eyes. An ancient airship, along with its brave Captain Gordon, emerges from the depths, revealing the great secrets of Q-Star. Despite the looming danger, Flame selflessly aids in evacuation, putting himself at risk to save others. As we watch with bated breath, we wonder: will the Captain of the Q-Star league make it out unscathed? And will the Buster Gang be able to return home safely aboard the airship? Let us hope and pray for their safe journey.

programme.title: TWINS CODE
programme.desc: When the Global Financial Tsunami hits, a recently-deceased billionaires fortune is locked in a flash drive disguised as a crystal necklace. Two different codes are needed to access it and, of course, possession of the chain. The famous Guangzhou Tower becomes their battleground when two rival groups clash in their hunt for the codes.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 5
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: A Serbian Film Movie Explained In Tamil | Cinemakaran
programme.desc: An ageing porn star agrees to participate in an art film in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a paedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

programme.title: Singer Binni Krishnakumar's Jewellery Collection
programme.desc: This series caters to fashion, beauty, skincare, and lifestyle enthusiasts. It offers diverse content, including skincare & makeup tutorials, fashion tips, lifestyle vlogs, and exclusive interviews with celebrities about their lifestyles. programme.title: """I wish not to quit Dravidian movements!"" - Kovai Selvaraj opens up."
programme.desc: Kovai Selvaraj shared audio announcing his resignation from ADMK. He accused EPS and OPS of fighting each other for their self-interests. He also said he has no interest in working with either of them. He added that he is not willing to give up on Dravidian ideologies.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 31
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: Low Memory
programme.desc: Sneevil gets amnesia and the Smighties take him on a camping adventure. They have a great time with him until he gets his memory back!

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: A kind boy GoGo finds a bean seed and grows it, which sprouts all the way into the clouds. GoGo climbs the plant and finds the Giants castle above the clouds.

programme.title: The Fallen Star
programme.desc: Maestra Saku teaches the Guardians how to connect with the constellations and make use of their powers. Pai is terrified of bats, but when a meteorite falls into the Shadowy Hollow, he has no choice but to connect with the bat constellation. As a result, he manages to beat the Rock-Eating Mutant and his phobia at the same time.

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: Zoonicorns in the Zooniverse
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of “macho man” a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: Dolphin Tales
programme.desc: Dunky has taken a small picnic bag and takes Keet to the lake. A nice day as by the lake very peaceful. Keet sees two dolphins in the lake and plays with them as they get friendly with each other. The prowling Cat is not too happy. And tries various antics to catch Keet with funny results. The dolphins become good friends with Keet and teach Cat a lesson to remember for a longtime

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: Zap doubts that Leila is tough enough, but she proves you dont mess with her when Sneevil vacuums up Smightyland and the Smighties.

programme.title: Non Stop Dance Party
programme.desc: Melody creates a tune so catchy that she puts all the Smighties into a trance. Its up to her to now save the day and stop the villains with her powerful music.

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he’s a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man – and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: MONKEY KALARI
programme.desc: A Kalari Gurukkal does a demonstration outside the Chai shop and suddenly the hotel has a massive swell of customers jostling in. Chai Raja is thrilled at the sudden pile of customers as tea glasses and snacks fly off the counter and even the flies are shooed off their hangout for lack of space. The extra publicity is great and Chai Raja sends out a complimentary snack plate with Sundar to the Kalari Guru- Basha planning to swipe a few complimentary snacks himself follows Sundar but then stops short as he sees the high leaps and stunts of the Gurukkal suddenly Basha is extremely interested in learning the art. (Basha sees the kalari moves as a easy way to out-of reach snack shelves). He approaches the teacher, but the latter is a stern man and is not easily coaxed. Basha tries buttering up the Gurukkal- at first the lazy Sundar doesnt clue in but when he realizes that Basha plans to use the Kalari moves to chomp away the fries kept for the customers. Sundar decides (thought bubbles) to master the art himself and beat Basha before he can succeed. Now the Kalari Guru has two very-very interested/undesired disciples who are intent on learning- or not letting the other one learn- Kalari! Add to this the fact that Chai Raja is losing his cool thanks to Sundar neglecting the customers and his job for the sake of the lessons. Sundar has to dash off for a bit and Basha creates his own Kalari moves. Its no time for monkeying but will Sundar realize that before its too late?

programme.title: Country Mouse and City Mouse
programme.desc: Country Mouse GoGo receives a letter from his urban friend UGo, and leaves for the city.

programme.title: DOGGONE DAY
programme.desc: Things are normal at Hotel California- and just as crazy- as Chai Raja serves up teas and Sundar tries to keep the frisky Basha at bay. But then turns up a hulk of a man who is brusque and curt- yet Chai Raja is impressed as he seems to be ex-military. However, Sundars accidentally trips on the mans kit which is burstingwith dog-catching equipment. Freaking out, Sundar tries all zany disguises so that the dogcatcher doesnt figure out that he is in fact a dog- which would have probably worked....if not for dependably wily Basha. The monkey repeatedly botches up Sundars attempts as Chai Raja scratches his head trying to figure out when he had hired such a plethora of ill-dressed waiters and where in chais name, was Sundar?! The dog catcher ultimately sniffs out Sundars existence and eagerly tries to nab him. In an unusual show of affection, Chai Raja refuses to hand over Sundar. But the dog catcher is stubborn and lurks around laying traps. Basha helps by purposely leading Sundar toward the traps. It would have been his last day at the shop for Sundar, but for Basha accidentally setting off a trap too early and the dogcatcher getting caught in one of his own traps. As the medics haul him off and Basha pouts, Sundar chuckles and starts swabbing the floor with gusto.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: APPRENTICE ALERT
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in his inventive mood and rigging up a new treat for his customers. In streak Basha chased by Sundar and the two mess around the kitchen while Chai Raja has stepped out for a second. As he tosses stuff to keep Sundar at bay, Basha accidentally makes a couple of special jalebis. Chai Raja steps back in and the two freeze mid-motion. Chai Raja scoops out the simmering jalebis and sniffs, his nose wrinkling. Sundar eagerly points at Basha sure that the monkey is sure to get in trouble this time, but much to his chagrin, Basha is hired- as an apprentice!! As Sundar glumly waits at the tables, Basha (the show-off) not only builds an acrobatic rapport with Chai Raja and makes life miserable for Sundar, but also manages to gobble up fries on the sly. Sundar has to find some means of getting Basha fired and tries to sneak in and mess with Bashas batter. But he ends up only making it better and earning Basha more pats on his back. The MP arrives and Chai Raja wants to show off his new apprentices skills Basha is in the spotlight and sure to crack under the heat. Sundar, meanwhile ready to be rid of Basha in any manner possible, sticks dynamite in the batter. Basha, stumped as to what to cook , hastily shapes up the batter into an inviting cake. Seeing a wick, the MP lights it- and slices...KABOOM! Both Basha and Sundar, trod with heavy shoulders out the tea stall as a charred Chai Raja signals they are fired.

programme.title: Don't Knock It Till You Have Built It
programme.desc: When Valeo breaks a hole from the Zooniverse INTO Pancake’s room, a swarm of Splutterbies enter as well, destroying Pancake’s house! Put yourself in someone else’s place to see how your actions might affect them and never give up in trying to accomplish your goals.

programme.title: Chill out!
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in the gaming world where an irascible frog is very angry: no wonder nobody ever wants to play with him, unless...

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: The Low Price of Fame
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: The Darkside Of The Sun
programme.desc: When the sun goes out in the Zooniverse, Pancake learns to not be afraid of the dark. Let your imagination think happy things, not scary things.

programme.title: The rudest crab that ever was
programme.desc: The twins give a grumpy Crab a lesson in good manners.

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: Ice Cream Stick
programme.desc: Ice cream arent just fun for eating, Hepi and Briko come up with some sizzling ideas

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: Take A Dance On Me
programme.desc: Pancake is terrible dancer, and when he joins the Zoonicorns in their dances to make flowers bloom, his issues could disrupt springtime. You dont have to be perfect at something to enjoy it.Feelings are as important as skills.

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: Dress code
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in a world where they can’t get into a party because they’re not wearing the right clothes.

programme.title: Cardboard Roll
programme.desc: Watch Hepi and Briko give toilet paper rolls a second more exciting life!

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
programme.desc: The Hare, the fastest animal in the woods, and the tortoise, the slowest, compete in a race.

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: The jealous panda
programme.desc: The twins are in a forest where they encounter the friendly panda Han who is happily playing with a wooden board. But another panda steals it to make a bridge between two rocks. For Yo Yo it will not be easy to get out of that situation.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: Lend A Helping Stare
programme.desc: Odessa gets into a staring contest with a Stareoffolous and needs to ask for help...but refuses to. You can do it, but sometimes you need to think about what help you need to get to the next step and ask for that help.

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: Mr. Pancake's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Pancake doesn’t follow instructions and goes on a wild joy ride! Understanding and following directions is important.

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: An Unforgettable Journey - 3 Little Pigs Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the world of fairytales, having been called out by the THREE BEARS. They ask the detective to investigate a fraudulent lottery. They have bought loads of packets of detergent in the hope of winning a cruise, which was the prize in the lottery. But the prize has gone to the 7 LITTLE GOATS and the 3 PIGS, who had only bought one packet each. SANDRA and FO will very soon discover that the whole think is a trap laid by the WOLF to devour the LITTLE GOATS and the PIGS.

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: Easter Egg Surprise Smash
programme.desc: Its the Easter Eggstravanganza and Sneevil traps Smighties in googs - slime-filled gooey eggs. Luckily, Dude is able to crack the secret code and help the Super Six rescue them in time.

programme.title: Unready To Rumble
programme.desc: Wally K’s bullying moves Fred to challenge him to a fight, secretly confident that Friday can become special fighting gloves for him. When Friday loses his memory though, Fred tries to cancel the fight, but can’t. Luckily, an attack by the cute aliens, the Cuddlemuffins take Wally down, and Fred gets the credit.

programme.title: Paint Job
programme.desc: It is makeover time. Paint, brushes, brooms and rollers, they have it all. But the mice want the walls in a shade of red, and Don and Colonel have decided that it has to be blue. To solve the confusion, Colonel cements the mice’s house shut. What would the mice do in return?

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: The Fallen Star
programme.desc: Maestra Saku teaches the Guardians how to connect with the constellations and make use of their powers. Pai is terrified of bats, but when a meteorite falls into the Shadowy Hollow, he has no choice but to connect with the bat constellation. As a result, he manages to beat the Rock-Eating Mutant and his phobia at the same time.

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: Oh It's So Noisy!
programme.desc: Tomorrow is Scots birthday and hes busy preparing for when Duda shows up and causes total chaos in Scots house. With his house in ruins, Scot stays overnight at Dudas house. However, Dudas loud snoring keeps Scot awake all night. Scot hopes to close his eyes after Duda leaves in the morning, but the constant noises outside drive him crazy. The friends plan a surprise party for Scot; Unfortunately, the clueless Scott exploits them and tells them to shut up. Later, Scot goes to look for his friends, but they are nowhere to be found. Scot is sad because he thinks he has alienated his friends. As he walks home alone, he hears his name being called. Its Duda and the others! They surprise you with a special gift.

programme.title: Trash Planet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Viudo
programme.desc: Una tormenta mortal demuestra a Vera que hasta una tragedia es capaz de regalar el amor a dos almas rotas.

programme.title: Laberintos
programme.desc: Marina decide adoptar a un pequeño, pero pronto descubre que su esposo la engaña y tiene otra familia.

programme.title: Laberintos
programme.desc: Marina decide adoptar a un pequeño, pero pronto descubre que su esposo la engaña y tiene otra familia.

programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News

programme.desc: A talk show tackling major news topics Al Arabiya-style.

programme.title: Fil Marma
programme.desc: A live sports programme providing intensive coverage of Saudi football news from all perspectives.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Budhi Diwali
programme.desc: It is Documentary film of 20 Minutes based on the Celebration of a Traditional festival of Budhi Diwali. This festival is organised in the villages of remote areas of Shillai and Sangrah Tehsils of Sirmour District in Himachal Pradesh in North India. Though Diwali festival has its roots in the Ramayana when lord Ram returned to Ayodya from exile (Banwas). But, Budhi Diwali celebration is connected with returning of Lord Ram, people don't agree with this.

programme.title: popeye meets ali baba's forty thieves (1080)
A Haul in One 1956
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are, believe it or not, pals and partners in a moving company. (Maybe it's because Popeye isn't squinting here.) Anyhow, Olive has made the mistake of hiring them. She hasn't finished packing yet, so the boys, smitten as soon as she answers the door, compete to help her. Once packed, they compete to move more impressive piles of her belongings. Popeye easily wins these contests, even though Bluto locks him in the van at one point. At the end, Bluto socks Popeye into the piano, then into a table; though he hardly seems to need it, Popeye still eats his spinach, then thrashes Bluto.

programme.title: Bride and Gloom
programme.desc: Popeye is marrying Olive tomorrow; he's ecstatic. She has a dream of the future, including twin sons who prove to be a real handful. When Popeye comes by the next morning, he gets a frosty reception

programme.title: Training Pigeons 1936
programme.desc: Betty Boop is training a flock of pigeons, but one stray leads Pudgy the pup on a precarious chase over the rooftops.

programme.title: Often an Orphan 1949
programme.desc: Charlie Dog tries everything to get Porky to take him in and he finally does. After a couple pranks the dog pound ends up picking up Porky and not the dog.

programme.title: Betty Boop's Museum
programme.desc: Koko takes Betty to the museum, where she's locked in overnight and forced to sing at the skeletons' dance

programme.title: It's Hummer Time 1950
programme.desc: A cat chases a hummingbird and repeatedly stumbles onto the property of a sleepy bulldog, who punishes the cat for each interruption of his slumber.

programme.title: Superman: Destruction Inc.-1942
programme.desc: Superman versus saboteurs at the Metropolis Munitions Plant

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: The Candid Candidate- 1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop campaigns for Grampy for Mayor; he wins by one vote, but finds politics is no picnic. Urban renewal is parodied.

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Felix Gets Broadcasted-1923
programme.desc: Felix spots a fisherman on his way to his fishing spot, and figures he can follow the guy and grab a quick lunch by stealing his catch. Although he successfully nabs a few fish, the angler catches on and finally captures Felix. To get his revenge, he sends Felix through the telephone wires ("broadcasted") to Egypt, and Felix finds out that the Egyptians don't want him there, either.

programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films, in a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', Bing Crosby, 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: A Ham in a Role 1949
programme.desc: A Shakespearian dog, tired of being a pie-in-the-face looney tune, quits Warner Brothers to study dramatic acting and goes to his country house to practice the bard. He finds that two polite twin gophers have taken over his abode and angrily throws them out. They retaliate by violently heckling him in comical accordance with his Shakespeare speeches.

programme.title: Space Thunder Kids 1991
programme.desc: Three children pilots fight against the Dark Empire on their mission to destroy the universe.

programme.title: Neath Brooklyn Bridge-1942
programme.desc: The East Side Kids uncover the body of a murder victim, but must protect the innocent girl accused of the crime

programme.title: Steamboat Bill Jr 1928
programme.desc: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew

programme.title: Cops 1922
programme.desc: A series of mishaps manages to make a young man get chased by a big city's entire police force

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 32;The Big House
programme.desc: When the Mayberry jail is called upon to lodge two hold-up men captured by the state police, Barney finds himself with more than he can handle - especially when "assisted" by ad-hoc deputy Gomer.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 28; The Rival
programme.desc: When Opie's efforts fail to attract classmate Karen's personal interest, Thelma Lou steps in to boost Opie's confidence but destroys Barney's along the way. Can Andy realign this skewed love quadrangle?

programme.title: Convict 13 -1920
programme.desc: A young golfer is mugged by an escaped convict and finds himself in a prison where he foils a jailbreak.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters to the President
programme.desc: In 1988, 17-year-old math genius Joon-Kyung lives in a small village. The village has a railroad that passes through it, but it doesn't have a train station. Joon-Kyung's lifelong dream is to have a way station for his sister and the villagers. He tries different ways to get a station built, including writing dozens of letters to the president with Ra-hee, the popular girl who has a crush on him.
